name: Real Time Attack
description: Race to victory in this speedrunning extravaganza! Control the lovable Rucky Anguish as he tries to defeat Do Good Natas and avenge his rat dad. With 16 levels of insane platforming action and built-in timer function, this is one real time adventure you'll LOVE attacking continuously! With full controller support, achievements, and most importantly SPEEDRUNNING LEADERBOARDS, you'll be fluttering with Rucky 24/7/365!
